dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT QOOCCV.OD_PB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT_ID AS CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT_ID , QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL AS APPROVER , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_REPORTED AS CUSTOMER_PROBLEM_DATE , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_OPENED AS DATE_REPORTED_TO_QA , QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION AS REGION , QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU AS SKU , QOOCCV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC AS ITEM_DESCRIPTION , QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT , QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME AS GSO_CONTACT , QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT AS SOURCING_AGENT , QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NUMBER AS VENDOR_NUMBER , QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME AS VENDOR_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NUMBER AS FACTORY_NUMBER , QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME AS FACTORY_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL AS FACTORY_EMAIL , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM AS DEFECT , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE AS DEFECT_CLASSIFICATION , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_SENT AS SAMPLE_REQUEST_DATE , QOOCCV.OD_PB_SAMPLE_AVAILABLE AS SAMPLE_AVAILABLE , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_RECEIVED AS SAMPLE_RECEIVE_DATE , QOOCCV.OD_PB_ROOT_CAUSE_TYPE AS FINDINGS , QOOCCV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID AS CAPID , QOOCCV.OD_PB_COMMENTS AS COMMENTS , QOOCCV.OD_PB_ATTACHMENT AS ATTACHMENTS , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_CLOSED AS DATE_CLOSED FROM Q_OD_OB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINTS_V QOOCCV WHERE NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION , 'X') = NVL(:P_REGION , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU , 1) = NVL(:P_SKU , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU , 1) ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_GSO_CONTACT , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCING_AGENT , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE , 'X') = NVL(:P_DEFECT_CLASSIFICATION , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SAMPLE_AVAILABLE , 'X') = NVL(:P_SAMPLE_AVAILABLE , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SAMPLE_AVAILABLE , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_ROOT_CAUSE_TYPE, 'X') = NVL(:P_FINDINGS , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_ROOT_CAUSE_TYPE, 'X') ) ORDER BY OD_PB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT_ID
